keyPolicies.policyDescription: Protect our local hospitals and health services from sell-off and closure.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Fighting for affordable housing and sustainable development
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Prevent Conservative Party plans to demolish hospitals and affordable homes for unaffordable homes or luxury flats. Support a government that will stand up for everyone in Hammersmith regardless of their background or income.
Keep the economy moving and improve financial services.
React to climate change and pollution by preserving parks and riversides and opposing a third runway at Heathrow.

issues.environment: React to climate change and pollution by preserving parks and riversides.
issues.health: Protect our local hospitals and health services from sell-off and closure.

housing.content: Prevent demolition of hospitals and affordable homes and construction of unaffordable homes or luxury flats.

leaflet.personalStatement: I have lived in Hammersmith my entire adult life – I wouldn’t want to live anywhere else. I have worked with the community to improve our area and provided effective representation at City Hall and in Parliament. I am proud to serve every part of Hammersmith, regardless of the different interests and needs.

politicalExperience.achievements: Worked with the community to improve our area.

Andy Slaughter speaking at a rally to save local hospital
